Tag_Youmay.description: [[Ainigmata Ostraka]] in ''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' | [[Needle in a Haystack | memory]] of [[Ezio Auditore da Firenze]]

General_Description: '''Needle in a Haystack''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''There is an [[Farm of Elais|occupied farm]] on the eastern coast of [[Kynthos Hills]]. I can be found buried beneath a large pile of hay.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
